titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a grant program to encourage the development and expansion of approved medical residency training programs in rural areas.
Rural Medical Residency Expansion Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Rural Medical Residency Expansion Act of 2021
This bill establishes a grant program within the Department of Health and Human Services for hospitals and other health care facilities in rural areas to establish or expand medical residency training programs.
